title: Bail Reform: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)

media:group.media:title: Bail Reform: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
media:group.media:description:
With midterm elections approaching, John Oliver discusses the issue at the core of many republican attack ads: bail reform.
